Comment: Look, downvote me to the oblivion…but the couple was not exactly smart about it.  It was unclear from the article if they were together before the visa expired. It sounds like they got married earlier. Why did the husband not file for the green card/adjusment of status?   Also, her overstaying the visa was really not a smart move to begin with and it sets you up for failure.  Not to mention, in the military they expedite things because of their service members duty, even to the extent of being eligible for citizenship after living overseas bc it counts as living on US soil when in the military.
Author: Illustrious_Cut1730
